summary: This is a collection of bat commands that will give you an edge in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This is a collection of commands that will give you an edge in the game. It includes 4 different txt files that all have a different set of commands.

File 1: Master.txt. Maxes out all skills and gives you all of the perks in all of the skill trees. ([b]NOT MINE, I TAKE NO CREDIT. ORIGINAL MOD HERE: http://bit.ly/1jWfOjj)
[/b]
File 2: Weapons.txt. Gives you some of the best weapons in the game, one of each type.

File 3: Mods.txt. Gives you superjump, increases the movement speed slightly, maxes out your carryweight, and adds 100000000 gold.

File 4: Armor.txt. Gives you the best armor, and Ebony Mail.

[b]THE INSTALLATION GUIDE IS NOT MINE, ALL CREDIT TO USERÂ [/b]XxAchilles147xX[b]: http://bit.ly/2c8lqHO
[/b]
-INSTALLATION-

Download first, then extract all 4 of the .txts to the main Skyrim folder, NOT the data directory.

To use it, open the console by pressing the ` / ~ key and type, bat [which txt file of mods you want, e.x. bat weapons, which would give you weapons]
author: Chaoz
